title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts 7/3/21
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts 7/3/21
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin has takes on which college athletes would have made the most if NIL rules had changed earlier (:56), why Scottie Pippen got what he deserved with his new book (2:20), and his DM convo with Damian Lillard about leaving Portland (5:40). Legendary Bulls writer Sam Smith on the ups and downs of Scottie Pippen, the inaccuracies in "The Last Dance," and why Zach LaVine is better than Devin Booker (9:50). Chris Mannix on possible Ben Simmons trades, and why Kyrie Irving is not leaving Brooklyn (23:35). Plus New York broadcasting icon Michael Kay on his battles with Mike Francesa and Craig Carton, as well as his most interesting and disastrous interviews (36:20). Make sure to follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates, and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
